content.body: Sigh... Leanpub have moved API publishing to their Pro plan. I guess I have to switch to something else
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Sigh... Leanpub have moved API publishing to their Pro plan. I guess I have to switch to something else

content.body: or it seems I can still use GitHub writing mode, but need to press a button to publish

content.body: Jake Archibald: hola! when you get a chance, https://github.com/whatwg/fetch/pull/1329 can still benefit from some of your review time
